message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to acquire a unique and valuable product. I believe it's worth a significant investment, and I'm willing to start with a price of $1500000.
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. I'm willing to make a serious investment, but I need to be within my budget.

I understand that $1200000 is a bit of a stretch for you, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm thinking of a price of $1350000. This way, you'll be getting a great deal, and I'll still be able to get a good price for the product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $1350000. I'm thinking more along the lines of $1200000 to $1250000. Can you consider that range?

I can see you're really interested in this product, and I appreciate your flexibility. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll meet you at $1300000, but that's as low as I can go. I believe it's a fair price considering the product's value and your investment.

I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $1300000. I'm thinking of $1250000, and I'm willing to make a serious commitment to purchase the product if you can meet me at that price.

I can see you're really serious about this purchase, and I appreciate your commitment. However, I've already made significant concessions, and I need to make sure I get a fair price for the product. I'm willing to meet you at $1280000, but that's as low as I can go. I'm hoping we can finalize the deal at this price.
